metadata.documentation: Hourly output is provided from the WACCM-X simulation with specified dynamics via GEOS5. The resolution is 0.9 x 1.25 in geographic latitude and longitude, respectively. At the high latitudes in the ionosphere the Heelis electric field is prescribed. The output includes the neutral wind, temperature and composition, plasma characteristics, ionospheric conductivities and electric field. Some technical details are that the surface and 3D emissions cycle through 2010, and no EPP flux is specified. The timestep is 5 minutes with a dynamical splitting of 16 and O+ transport time splitting of 30. The compset is FXHIST and resolution f19_f19.
